entry.title: Apps
entry.summary: Stantium Company provides apps and other software to help you accomplish your goals. Stantium…
entry.content:
Stantium Company provides apps and other software to help you accomplish your goals.

 

Stantium Personal Finance v 1.04

($25, digital download)


This downloadable spreadsheet app requires the desktop version of Microsoft Excel 2016.

Stanley's Thumb Drive Apps

($10.99, free shipping)

This thumb drive contains the following types of 1st class open source software: note taking, music and video player, spreadsheet, word processor, slide/presentation, text-to-speech, virus scanner, and an unnecessary file remover.

These apps are configured to run directly from the thumb drive. All you have to do is plug the drive into your computer, start the menu app, and select the app that you would like to use.

entry.title: WHAT WE CAN DO FOR YOU
entry.summary: Consult with you to build or locate software that will accomplish your goalsDesign,…
entry.content:
• Consult with you to build or locate software that will accomplish your goals
  • Design, build, or change spreadsheets, databases, and database queries using Excel, VBA, Microsoft SQL Server, Microsoft Access, and SQLite
  • Prototype/mock-up apps and databases
  • Build simple static websites
  • Enter, transform, and analyze your data
  • Provide computerized accounting and bookeeping services
  • Supply Linux-based computers loaded with programs that get things done
  • Tutor and support you one-on-one

 

May we find, design, and/or build a solution for you? If so, please contact us. 313.348.9400
